# Peach Pie

## Ingredients

* About 8 peaches, sliced
* 1 orange
* pie crust (pre-made?)
* 0.75 cup sugar
* 1 Tbl margarine
* 1 heaping Tbl flour
* 1 egg
* 1 tsp almond extract

## Instrctions

Slice peaches into an unbaked pie crust. Sprinkle with the joice and grated rind of one orange. Bake for 20 minutes at 350&deg;F.

Beat the sugar, margarine, flour, egg, and almond flavoring together. Spread it over the hot pie and bake an additional 20 minutes. Cool pie a few hours before cutting.
